definition: to receive/to accept/to suffer/subjected to/to bear/to stand/pleasant/(passive marker)

sentences.english: Doing so would help prevent the sample from becoming unnecessarily moist.
sentences.chinese: 這樣做會有助於阻止樣品不必要的受潮。

sentences.english: Keep this product away from rain and wetness.
sentences.chinese: 勿讓本產品淋雨或受潮。

sentences.english: They attributed the damage to the effect of dampness during the long sea voyage .
sentences.chinese: 他們把損失歸咎於長途海運中受潮了。

sentences.english: Avoid exposing to heat and moisture, screw down the aluminium lid, use immediately after opening up.
sentences.chinese: 本品避免受熱受潮，請擰緊鋁蓋，打開後及時使用。

sentences.english: Those of black smoke came damp, suddenly, the guy red sad.
sentences.chinese: 羞澀的眼色碰上受潮的煙，倏忽，哀愁的眼孔通紅。

sentences.english: The packing should also moisture-proof to avoid the effect of damp in transit.
sentences.chinese: 爲避免貨物在運輸途中受潮，包裝還要注意做到防潮。

sentences.english: The cable should be stored carefully, avoiding the humidity and water infiltration.
sentences.chinese: 必須防止電纜頭受潮或進水。

sentences.english: Dry the furniture or leave out in the sun if it becomes wet.
sentences.chinese: 如果傢俱受潮，就要把它烘乾或者放在太陽底下曬。

sentences.english: The drug has lost its potence by being exposed to moisture.
sentences.chinese: 這藥因受潮失去了效力。

sentences.english: They attributed the damage to the effects of dampness during the long sea voyage.
sentences.chinese: 他們把貨損歸咎於長途海運中受潮了。

sentences.english: Leather can deteriorate in damp conditions.
Electrode shall be kept in the dryer to prevent the covering from being damped.
sentences.chinese: 爲了防止焊條藥皮受潮，焊條應放於乾燥箱內。

sentences.english: The rice dampened and molded during the summer rains.
sentences.chinese: 在夏天雨季大米已受潮發黴。

definition: (of clothing, furniture, walls etc) to get damp (by absorbing moisture from the air or the ground)
to degenerate/to deteriorate/(of food) to go bad/to go off/(geology) metamorphism
to split open/to dehisce (of fruit or cotton bolls, to split open)
to leak electricity/(fig.) (coll.) to unintentionally arouse romantic interest (by being solicitous etc)/cf. 放電|放电[fang4 dian4]
